thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com | 3 of 102
thread.title: Mr. RICHARD SPAULDING
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Mr. RICHARD SPAULDING

author: Mr. RICHARD SPAULDING
title: Mr. RICHARD SPAULDING
text: First time to use a travel agent as I usually book for myself on-line. But using this service they were able to find fares significantly less than on-line postings. Will use them again. Had trouble finding the right flight by the right carrier but they persevered until I was satisified with the results.
